name: a name for this piece of data.  could be anything.  should probably be short
description: a description of this piece of data if name is not a sufficient description
type: required: what this data represents.  a weight measurement?  a gas fillup?  will suggest what other properties this data should have.  could be a type defined in the Zoe.types collection, or it could just be a name to group by.
createdOn: required: day and time this data was created
modifiedOn: day and time this data was last modified
updateCount: number of times this data was modified
source: what program or process and device sent this data to be recorded
